jobs_description:
eMaids of East Queens & West Nassau is growing fast and we are looking for a qualified Office Assistant to join our team in the area. eMaids is an amazing organization and we will be glad to have you as our next team member!
This position is unique we are looking for a full-time and qualified Office Assistant to join our team in the area. Read the whole ad so you are sure you are the right fit.

We are looking for an office person, but who is willing to clean and train our cleaners in the field. As we grow, the position will be 90% in the office and only in the field when needed.  MUST HAVE CLEANING EXPERIENCE.
eMaids is an amazing organization and we will be glad to have you as our next team member!

RESPONSIBILITIES-
 
Great potential for the right individual. Candidate Must speak Spanish-
This position is 4 days a week from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM

IN OFFICE
Coordinate daily scheduling
Answer phone calls
Communicate effectively with clients and employees
Help promote sales
Ensure customer satisfaction (quality and timely delivery) and budget objectives are met
IN THE FIELD:

 RESPONSIBILITIES
Supervise and run larger job site cleanings
Perform cleaning inspections on new maids (2-3 per week)
Follow up with customers who have a complaint about cleanings
Help interview and hire new maids
Train and coach new maids on cleaning standards and procedures
Provide onsite estimates

REQUIREMENTS

eMaids is looking for true professionals who are serious about their work, passionate about cleaning, and extremely customer service oriented. 

Candidate must:
Be legal to Work in the U. S.
Strong customer service and communication skills (both verbal and written)
Excellent computer skills
Very detail-oriented and follows tasks and projects through to completion
Be a fast learner
Be a team player
Bilingual Spanish speakers are a must
Candidate must have prior sales experience
Candidate must have at least 6 months of cleaning experience

 WHY WORK FOR eMaids? You will grow with us, be our right hand!
  • Great office support
  • Competitive compensation package
  • Paid training from day one
  • Great opportunity for advancement
  • Paid time off
  • Flexible schedule
  • Bonus incentives
  • Great opportunity for advancement
  • Gas reimbursement
  • Bonus structure
  • Portable Voluntary Benefits program after 6 months
  • Paid Accident insurance after 6 months

ABOUT eMaids
eMaids is a national cleaning service provider passionately concerned with giving our residential and commercial clients a sparkling transformation that surpasses expectations.
 
Here at eMaids, we pride ourselves on delivering top-notch services that guarantee our customer satisfaction. We are currently seeking employees in the area who will help add value to our organization. As an employee at eMaids, you have become part of our family! We care about our employees and ensure that you get adequate office support, and paid training on the job while you enjoy a phenomenal working environment.
 
We Service the following areas in East Queens: Jamaica, St Albans, Rosedale, Springfield, Gardens/Laurelton, Hollis, Queens village Cambria heights Bellerose.
 
If you think you are a good fit and have a can-do attitude, we want to hear from you.
Apply today, we are looking to hire immediately. 
 
Must send salary requirements

jobs_name: Buscamos personas para nuestra familia de MAID BRIGADE.
jobs_description:
Oportunidad interesante con Maid Brigade
Quiere trabajar donde…
…donde se trata en una manera justa? …donde esta parte de un equipo? …donde puede ver los resultados de su trabajo dura? …donde puede hacer una diferencia para otras personas?a
Trabaje donde se importa.
¡Ven a trabajar a Maid Brigade! Somos una empresa de propiedad local con una reputación buena y base de clientes estable y en crecimiento. Por esta razón, buscando algunas personas especiales de unirse con nuestro equipo.
¡No necesita experiencia! Podemos enseñarle las habilidades valiosas de limpieza profesional y servicio al cliente que necesita para tener éxito a Maid Brigade y a cualquier jugar trabajaría en el futuro.
Si esta buscando por una oportunidad interesante con beneficios buenas en una industria divertida, este puede ser el trabajo para usted!
 
Nuestro equipo:
Sea una parte de un equipo de crecimiento y de propiedad local que provee los servicios profesionales de limpieza de casas:
  •       Estamos orgullosos de hacer una diferencia en las vidas de nuestros clientes
  •       Proveemos servicios de limpieza no tóxicos que tienen certificación ecológica “Green Cleaning”
  •       Proveemos el nivel más alto de detalle, servicio al cliente y satisfacción del cliente en la industria
  •       Usa nuestros coches de la impresa
  •       Un ambiente que promueve colaboración y crecimiento
 
Los beneficios:
  •       Recibir los suministros, uniforme y equipo
  •       Entrenamiento profesional y laboral
  •       Tiempo libre pagado – 6 días de fiesta
  •       Tiempo de vacaciones sobre las horas acumuladas
 
Los requisitos:
  •       Debe ser responsable, cortes, de actitud positiva, detallista y amable
  •       Responsable de suministros, llaves de los clientes, archivos y otra información personal

Looking for an opportunity to grow, come and join us at eMaids of Montgomery County !!!!



WHY WORK FOR eMaids?

  • Great office support
  • Competitive compensation
  • Paid training from day one 
  • Great opportunity for advancement
  • Paid weekly- direct deposit available
  • All cleaning supplies and equipment provided
  • 5-Star Service Review Bonuses
  • Client Retention Bonuses
  • New Client Referral Bonus
  • 1x a month a car wash on us
  • Every 3 months, we will give you $50 towards an oil change for your vehicle.

JOB SUMMARY

eMaids is  excited to be recruiting for professional PART-TIME Professional Maid to join our team in the area. DAY SHIFT- NO EVENING AVAILABILITY.


RESPONSIBILITIES
You will be required to deliver quality cleaning services to our client’s residential or commercial properties:

Cleaning of various properties like (Offices, Apartments, Houses, Commercial Properties, etc.)


REQUIREMENTS

**Applicants must be able to travel to different locations.

**Must live within Montgomery County (Rockville, Gaithersburg, Chevy Chase, Germantown, Takoma Park, Silver Spring, Olney , Kensington, Clarksburg, or closer to these areas) .


Apply online and  we will get back to you ASAP to schedule the interview!

jobs_name: Clean Houses  Make Friends  Have Fun    Now Hiring Molly Maid
jobs_description:
Our amazing team is looking for House Cleaners, no experience required.
Great company! Great work environment!
• No nights, no weekends! Family friendly hours. Team members work 35 to 40 hours per week
• Great weekly pay and tips, paid training, and a family culture. Pay averages between $500-$700 per week depending on position Base Pay starts at $15 Per hour
• All cleaning supplies and equipment provided as well as transportation to and from
  our customers’ homes.
• Lots of Opportunity for bonuses and incentives

Maid, House Cleaning and Housekeeper Responsibilities:
• Clean customer’s homes the Molly Maid way
• Communicate with customers and staff in a professional and courteous manner
• Have an eye for detail. Leave homes looking GREAT!

This is hard work, but can be very rewarding for people who have pride in a job well done, like
to help people and like to stay moving. We have a great team and are looking to add more House
Cleaners with great attitudes and dependability.

Hiring Immediately- give us a call or come see us today!
9700 Lakeshore Dr. East Indianapolis IN 46280

jobs_name: Fulltime House Cleaner at Molly Maid
jobs_description:
We are seeking self-motivated, hardworking individuals to join our team cleaning houses in the Northern Colorado area.

At Molly Maid, we make a difference in the busy lives of our customers by giving them the gift of time through our housekeeping services. We were established in 2006 and are based out of Loveland, Colorado. We are primarily a residential house cleaning company with a primary focus on recurring customers. We work in teams of two, drive company cars, and have all equipment serviced and provided.

The pay range averages between $17 - $20 per hour plus tips after training. This job is task-based pay. The more efficiently you work, the more money you make!

Why Molly Maid?

  • A company car is provided, so there is no wear and tear on your vehicle.
  • No nights or weekends.
  • All equipment, uniforms (not shoes), and supplies provided
  • We have been proudly serving our customers in the Northern Colorado area for 16 years.
  • We pay weekly.
  • We keep your schedule full.
  • We work hard to be as flexible as our employee's schedules require.
Job Details:

  • This is a Monday through Friday, 8:00 am through 5:00 pm job. We are not hiring part-time at the moment. 
  • We work in teams of two, so you are never alone in homes, get your cleanings done twice as fast, and you get more breaks throughout the day.
  • Paid time off (PTO) after 1 year.
  • 401(K) with match after 1 year.
  • Opportunity for advancement.

jobs_name: GENERAL HOUSE CLEANER NEEDED CALL TODAY TWO MAIDS GILBERT
jobs_description:
Looking for a change of pace, but still want to work normal hours to spend time doing the hobbies you love and spend time with your loved ones?  Two Maids Gilbert is seeking to expand our Two Maids Franchise teams. 

What you need to know:
  • Two Maids Gilbert is a Franchise of 100 plus locations that are Nationwide (Individually Owned).  We strive together, as a team of 45 plus employees, to be the most reputable House Cleaning company in the Valley.  Our team's provide our customer's the most valuable thing we can give someone, and that is giving them time back to spend with their families.  Our work is appreciated and our team's love to see the impact their work provides to help our customers in their daily lives.
  • Two Maids Gilbert, services the East Valley cities of Gilbert, Chandler, Queen Creek, Mesa, and Apache Junction.
  • We provide all chemicals and equipment for our team's. 
NO NIGHTS, NO WEEKENDS, NO HOLIDAYS

If you can answer “Yes” to the questions below, we’d like to schedule an interview with you!

1.      I am 18 years old or older.
2.      I am legally authorized to work in the US.
3.      I am okay with a company performing a criminal background check on me.
4.      I own a dependable automobile that is properly insured.
5.      I am able to use my vehicle for this position, understanding that I will be reimbursed for all mileage traveled.
6.      I am able to work Monday-Friday from 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM or until finished.

Responsibilities
•
His/her job description entails maintaining a homes by sweeping, vacuuming, and mopping floors; taking out the trash, cleaning doors,   windows; and disinfecting and wiping down surfaces 
•
In other words, a general cleaner is an individual with the responsibility of providing and maintaining quality service to the standards and frequency within the cleaning specifications
•
His/her duties may include dusting, sweeping, and mopping; vacuuming, cleaning ceiling vents, and cleaning bathrooms
•
Also, a general cleaner is responsible for carrying out various cleaning and maintenance tasks, overseeing the upkeep and maintenance of all cleaning equipment and supplies, and products
•
It may also include scrubbing sinks, basins, toilets in bathrooms; and immediately reporting repairs and replacements that are needed
•
The general cleaner work description may also entail participating in all relevant training as required, reporting all faults directly to the supervisor, and ensuring that safety precautions are taken in order to ensure the safe use of all equipment
•
It may also involve emptying waste bins into waste bags and carrying the waste bags to collection points
•
The general cleaner is expected to promote and comply with his/her organization's procedures and policies, and ensure the health and safety of other people in the work environment are protected while delivering his/her services.

**We offer a competitive compensation package that includes all of your supplies and equipment, as well as regular bonuses, awards, and incentives.  We believe that hard work and top performance deserve recognition.

**We give back to our community by servicing cancer patients in partnership with "Cleaning for A Reason"
 
Candidates with the following experience are encouraged to apply: home health aide, caretaker, hospitality, carpet cleaners, general laborer, waiter, hotel housekeeping

jobs_name: HIRING NOW Housekeepers at TWO MAIDS OF GILBERT
jobs_description:
You’re a good fit if you:

  • Like an active job and don’t like sitting around
  • Have your own reliable working car with insurance 
  • Are good with Google Maps
  • Think there’s no task too small or too large!
  • Are consistently early and you rarely miss work
  • Loves that feeling when leaving a space cleaner than you found it
  • Experience as a housekeeper, hotel cleaner, or with customer service
  • Are a team player
Responsibilities(including but not limited to):

  • Wipe down countertops, desks, and other surfaces
  • Scrub kitchen and bathroom fixtures, including toilets and urinals
  • Collect and dispose of trash
  • Hand wash dishes
  • Spot clean cabinets, drawers, and glass surfaces
  • Steel-shine appliances and fixtures
  • Sweep, vacuum, and mop floors
  • Ensure client location is locked and secured when leaving
  • Interact positively with fellow Two Maids team members
  • Communicate professionally with clients and supervisors
  • Commit to continued learning and training throughout employment
  • Arrive to all sessions and meetings on time
  • Comply with safety policies and procedures
Benefits:

  • Opportunities for career advancement
  • Scheduling that meets your needs
  • TeleHealth insurance
  • Paid sick time
  • Workers compensation insurance
  • $17 to $23 average hourly pay with our Pay for Performance plan Semi-Monthly pay (Paid on the 5th and the 21st). Direct Deposit
Requirements:

  • High school diploma or GED strongly preferred
  • Possess a functional smartphone with a data plan
  • Have your own reliable working car
  • Willing to travel East Valley cities
  • Ability to work and communicate in a team
  • Physical requirements include: walking and standing during the entire shift (often 4-8 hours),climbing stairs, kneeling to clean floors, pushing and pulling objects, lifting and moving objects (up to 50 lbs), and cleaning
Who will make a great team member?:   
  • Must be 18 years old or older!  
  • Must be able to work flexible shifts Monday - Friday 7:00am - 5:00 pm or until finished
  • Must have your own vehicle and a valid driver’s license!  
  • You have a good work ethic and enjoy serving people! 
  • A meticulous eye for detail, nothing gets past you! 
  • A person who has dreams to do more than clean homes! 
  • We need future leaders! We are growing and need people who are future focused!

**We offer a competitive compensation package that includes all of your supplies and equipment, as well as regular bonuses, awards, and incentives.  We believe that hard work and top performance deserve recognition.

**We give back to our community by servicing cancer patients in partnership with "Cleaning for A Reason"

Do you enjoy helping people? Do you wish that you could find a company which values your hard work?

As a House Cleaner / Maid at Two Maids Gilbert, you work with some of the most talented and thoughtful people in the industry. We prepare you for success from day one, with training from our experienced Field Managers.

The best part: no previous experiences required!

Along the way, you amaze clients with your strong cleaning skills and empathetic nature. You always take special care to adhere to all health and safety precautions and guidelines.
If you can answer “Yes” to the questions below, we’d like to schedule an interview with you!

1.      I am 18 years old or older.
2.      I am legally authorized to work in the US.
3.      I am okay with a company performing a criminal background check on me.
4.      I own a dependable automobile that is properly insured.
5.      I am able to use my vehicle for this position, understanding that I will be reimbursed for all mileage traveled.
6.      I am able to work Monday-Friday from 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM or until finished.


Key Qualifications of House Cleaner / Maid

  • Fluency in English, with a passion for great communication.
  • Ability to lift up to 30 pounds and spend a day on your feet.
  • Strong empathy to clients with a can-do attitude.
Why join Two Maids as a House Cleaner / Maid?

· No Experience Necessary

No experience? No problem! We train you from day one. You’ll also learn some helpful tips and tricks along the way. Most of our House Cleaner / Maid has no previous cleaning experiences. AND they are just great, after our effective training!

· Awesome Pay

We recognize and reward top performers through our one-of-a-kind Pay for Performance Plan. $17 to $23 on average 

· Amazing Growth Potential

We reward your great performance with higher pay. It is a job, but also an amazing growth opportunity!

· Life Friendly Scheduling
Whether you’re a parent or a student, we work to accommodate your schedule. We are so proud that we supported 2 full time employees to get their Bachelor’s Degree. Proud of that!

· Daytime Hours = Happy Life, for our House Cleaner / Maid

Say goodbye to crazy shifts and irregular hours. We will never ask you to clean on weekends, evenings or holidays

· No Hidden Costs

Other cleaning companies either don’t provide cleaning supplies or deduct their cost from your salary. We cover your supplies.

· Tips Are 100% Yours

Our house cleaner / maid often earn at least $2,500 in tips each year. Some a lot more! The best part? The tips are all yours! You earned them!

· CoVID-19 Conscious
Your health is our first priority. That’s why we supply our house cleaners / maid with free PPE.

· A Company that Truly Cares
We are a franchise. As a locally owned and operated business in Gilbert, we put our people first.

· Fantastic Team Members for House Cleaner / Maid

We love who we work with, and you will too. Get to know your colleagues at our morning all hands meetings and fun quarterly events.

Additional Qualifications for House Cleaner / Maid

  • Drug free lifestyle.
  • Amazing on time performance.
  • Authorization to work and live in the United States.
Benefits

  • The best team members! You would truly enjoy them!
  • Quarterly events

Job Title: Ecotech Professional Cleaner

Save the environment and your weekends too! At ecomaids we believe you can have work-life balance while making a positive impact. Be good to yourself and join our team today.

Ecotechs provide professional cleaning in customers’ homes.  Ecotechs receive a company vehicle, equipment, and eco-friendly supplies. No professional cleaning experience is required as we provide full training and support.
 
Highlights (What’s in it for me?)

·       Ecotechs earn between $15 - $18 / hour (average with hourly pay, performance bonuses, and tips)

·       Reliable company vehicle

3.      Predictable Pay (and Opportunities to Earn More). We offer fair pay & benefits that provide a consistent paycheck and incentives to earn more by doing great work.  

4.      Professional Supportive Workplace (Car, Equipment, Training & Benefits. We provide everything you need to be successful including a branded car, quality cleaning equipment, training and a supportive manager.

Job Title: Professional Cleaner Team Lead

Save the environment and your weekends too! At ecomaids we believe you can have work-life balance while making a positive impact. Be good to yourself and join our team today.

As Team Lead you will provide professional cleaning in customers’ homes and manage 1-2 other cleaners to complete jobs. You will receive a company vehicle, equipment, and eco-friendly supplies.

Professional cleaning / management experience is a requirement for this position as you will be responsible for customer service and team support


 Highlights (What’s in it for me?)

·       Team Leads earn between $17-$20 / hour (average with hourly pay, performance bonuses, and tips)
·       Reliable company vehicle
·       Stable 8 am to 5 pm Monday-Friday Schedules
·       Career advancement opportunities to manager or trainer roles
·       Benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision, Vacation, paid Holidays)
·       All-natural cleaning products that are healthy for you to use on a daily basis
·       Full on-the-job training provided
·       High-quality cleaning equipment and supplies provided


 Why join ecomaids?

Here are the top reasons our people love working at ecomaids:

1.      Human (& eco) Friendly Products. We value supporting human and planetary health, so we are committed to only using the best, eco-friendly products and methods.
2.      Stable Monday to Friday Schedule (No Evenings or Weekends!). Work-life balance is important to you and you don’t want to plan your life around an unpredictable schedule.
3.      Predictable Pay (and Opportunities to Earn More). We offer fair pay & benefits that provide a consistent paycheck and incentives to earn more by doing great work.  
4.      Professional Supportive Workplace (Car, Equipment, Training & Benefits. We provide everything you need to be successful including a branded car, quality cleaning equipment, training and a supportive manager.


 About ecomaids:

ecomaids is an industry-leading franchise that provides eco-friendly cleaning services. We have a simple mission: to deliver a professional cleaning experience every time while protecting your health, the health of your family, and the environment. This is our passion and the reason we do what we do.


 Does this sound like you?

·       You have a valid driver’s license and a clean driving record.
·       You are detail-oriented and enjoy the satisfaction of a job well done.
·       You are active and like to work on your feet instead of sitting at a desk.
·       You are a friendly team player.
·       You are trustworthy and reliable.
·       You like helping people.

 We’re growing fast and so can your career! If you’re looking for a company that values work-life balance while making a positive impact, join our team today.

 To find out more visit us at www.ecomaids.com/careers

jobs_name: House Cleaners Let Molly Maid Pay for the GAS
jobs_description:
Benefits/Perks:
  • This is a GREAT job for stay-at-home parents returning to the workforce!
  • Guaranteed minimum hourly rate of  $13 (training), more if you make more at your current job
  • Company Car provided for cleaning
  • Direct Deposit with Incentive Opportunities
  • Paid Training, vacation, and holidays
  • Have fun celebrating diversity, seasonal traditions, and employee milestones
  • We have career growth opportunities- promotions rewarded to those who are awesome, work hard, and perform a great clean
  • Office culture is important to us- we want you to love to come to work!
House Cleaning Responsibilities:
  • Perform professional residential cleaning services including mopping, vacuuming, dusting, sanitizing, wipe downs and other final touches
  • Communicate with customers and staff in a professional and courteous manner
  • Work Monday to Friday
  • Able to clean multiple homes per day
  • No cleaning service experience required    
 
Position Cleaning Requirements:
  • Valid Driver’s License
  • A great attitude - we will train you!

Come work for Happy Maids. "We Guarantee" you will be happy here!!!
 Are you honest, dependable, and detail-oriented with pride in your work? Do you have a positive attitude?    

This job is for YOU!  Click here to apply.

Happy Maids is looking for cleaners and maids to start ASAP! If you have cleaning experience, we would love to work with you.

We are looking for individuals.

 WHY YOU SHOULD APPLY 
  • Make $800+ a week
  • Plus, tips
  • Plus, bonuses
  • Paid weekly
 ATTRIBUTES WE ARE LOOKING FOR
  • Have home cleaning experience
  • Must be a detail-oriented, hard worker, and love to clean.
  • Must be energetic and always have a great attitude.
  • Must be RELIABLE & TRUSTWORTHY
 REQUIREMENTS
  • Have home cleaning experience.
  • Must have a valid social security number and be authorized to work in the United States. 
  • Dependable Car
  • Clean background check
  • Speak English.
 
 Any maids and cleaners that are interested in starting ASAP, Apply here.

Welcome for Two Maids Gilbert! If you are looking for a family oriented environment who cares about you and your needs you are encouraged to apply. We provide full training for this position.
All equipment, tools, and chemicals are provided for our teams. 
We clean all residential homes, apartments, town homes, condos, and offices.
If you have an eye for detail and care about your customers you are encouraged to apply.

Requirements for Two Maids:

This is a full time position. Must have availability Monday through Friday 7:00am to 5:00 pm or until finished

Provide valid drivers license, proof of insurance, and have reliable transportation.

Must be 18 years or older, No Felonies


We offer Employee benefits including Dental/ Vison/ Health/ 401K

Mileage reimbursement/ Work Incentives

Weekly bonus opportunities


We service the East Valley of Gilbert, Chandler, Mesa, Queen Creek, and Apache Junction.

Description for Position:
We provide quality cleans to our clients. Including Recurring cleans, specializing in Deep cleans, and Move in Move out services. 

We are passionate about our partnership with “Cleaning For A Reason” where we provide free cleanings to individuals undergoing cancer treatment. 

In homes you will be dusting, sweeping and mopping. Completing all kitchens, bathrooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and offices. Everything is top to bottom, left to right to complete a quality clean to Two Maids Standards. You will be going inside all toilets, showers, bathtubs, microwaves, and even inside ovens and refrigerators. If you have a passion for cleaning you are encouraged to apply! 
 

 Apply today to schedule an interview! Just click the link below, 
schedule your interview and return here and finish your application. 

Two Maids and A Mop Gilbert Interview
1111 North Gilbert Road Suite 116
Gilbert Arizona, 85234

jobs_name: HOUSE CLEANING / MAIDS $600 - 700 PER WEEK PLUS TIPS!
jobs_description:
If you HATE working nights, weekends and holidays, if you want to spend that time with your family, if you're looking for a Monday - Friday full time / daytime job here it is!!

The Cleaning Authority is seeking individuals looking for long term, PERMANENT employment.
If you are a RELIABLE, HARD WORKING individual with INTEGRITY call us today!!
$600.00 - 700.00 PER WEEK PLUS TIPS 
Paid travel time and mileage
Weekly pay on Friday
A CAR, VALID DRIVERS LICENSE and INSURANCE are required
Residential cleaning only. NO JANITORIAL OR COMMERCIAL WORK
Full time day time only. No part time or shift work
 
Call today 614-865-1297

We are hiring Professional House Cleaners!!!

$17 -$23 average pay with our Pay for Performance plan. 
  • A desire to make more money than whatever the “hourly rate” is! We pay for performance! When our customers are happy you earn more!
We are searching far and wide for motivated professionals who are excited to make a difference in our Customer's lives as part of our growing team at Two Maids & A Mop. The ideal candidate will be an ambitious, energetic, and service-oriented individual who enjoys providing top-quality service to our Clients.

Qualities we are looking for:
Customer Focused - Two Maids & A Mop is a customer service company that just happens to clean houses.

Dependability - This is a full time position Monday through Friday 7:20 am - 5:00 or until finished

Trustworthy - Display a high level of honesty and integrity at all times.

Energetic - Our days are fast-paced, full of surprises and challenging in so many ways!

Communications - We communicate with our customers, managers, and co-workers in a clear and professional manner.

Problem Solving - It's very important to be able to resolve issues and think independently.

Time Management - Efficiency is your key to success!

Detail Oriented - Did you see that cobweb in the corner? A trained eye will notice every detail and ensure customer satisfaction every single day.


More about the Position:
Professional House Cleaners will be traveling to our customer's homes as part of a team to perform routine and specific tasks as assigned. As a Professional House Cleaner, you will be responsible for providing top quality work and customer service to our customers through various tasks and communications. We offer a competitive compensation package that includes mileage reimbursement, paid training, all of your supplies and equipment, and various awards and incentives. We believe that hard work and top performance deserve recognition, and our company provides a culture where it's possible to have fun, work hard, and feel appreciated.
We can't wait to see your big smile and learn more about your ambitions!!!

NOTE: The office is located in Frederick, MD 21702

  • A valid driver's license and vehicle to go from job to job throughout the day!
  • A strong work ethic and enjoys working with others!

See job description in English and Spanish below:

Ama de llaves, limpieza
¡Contratación inmediata!

¿Eres una persona con gran energía que disfruta dar un servicio excelente? Si es así, considera unirte a nuestro equipo de Two Maids & A Mop! Somos una empresa de limpieza única que reconoce el esfuerzo de trabajo.

Ofrecemos un paquete de compensación competitivo que incluye reembolso de millas, entrenamiento pagado y todos los materiales de limpieza y equipos.

Beneficios:
- Compensación competitive y reembolso de millas.
- ¡No noches. No fines de semana. No feriados!
- Ofrecemos un ambiente de trabajo orientado a la familia.
- Oportunidades de crecimiento profesional.
- Entrenamiento pagado.
- Se provee uniforme y equipo.

Características principales del candidato ideal:
- Energético: ¡nuestros días son agiles y dinámicos, nadie se aburre!
- Consistente: buscamos gente responsable que busca trabajar consistemente de lunes a viernes.
- Confiable: honestidad e integridad son características críticas.
- Buena comunicación: valoramos comunicación clara y concisa.
- Solucionador de problemas: capacidad para resolver problemas con creatividad, iniciativa y buen juicio.
- Buen manejo de tiempo: ¡el trabajo eficiente resulta en empleados y clientes contentos!
- Orientación al detalle: tener un buen ojo para los detalles, nada se te pasa.
- Orientación al cliente: nuestros clientes son nuestra prioridad todo el tiempo.
 
Alentamos a postular a los candidatos con la siguiente experiencia: personal de restaurante, trabajador de limpieza de hotel, limpiadores de alfombras, asistente de salud en el hogar, cuidador, trabajador en general.

¡Nos comunicaremos con usted por correo electrónico, texto o teléfono inmediatamente una vez que haya solicitado!

Ofrecemos un paquete de compensación competitivo que incluye reembolso de millas, entrenamiento pagado y todos los materiales de limpieza y equipos.

Requisitos:
- Debe tener 18 años de edad o más.
- Disponible de lunes a viernes, 8am a 4pm.
- Debe tener buena ética de trabajo y disfrutar dar buen servicio a clientes.
- Debe tener su propio vehículo y licencia de conducir válida.

Puedes encontrar mas información de la empresa en la siguiente pagina web:
https://twomaidsandamop.com/

>>>

Housekeeper / Maid
Hiring Immediately!

Are you an ambitious, energetic, and service-oriented individual who enjoys providing top-quality service to make someone’s day? Look no further – a housekeeper career with Two Maids & A Mop is the job for you! Our company provides a culture where it's possible to have fun, work hard, and feel appreciated.

We offer our housekeepers a competitive compensation package that includes mileage reimbursement, paid training and all of your supplies and equipment. We believe that hard work and top performance deserve recognition.

Employee benefits:
- Competitive compensation and mileage reimbursement.
- No nights. No weekends. No holidays!
- Family-oriented work environment.
- Advancement opportunities.
- Paid training.
- Uniform and equipment provided.

Key qualifications:
- Energetic: our days are fast-paced and dynamic, there is very little downtime.
- Dependable: this is a full-time position and consistent attendance is very important.
- Trustworthy: honesty and integrity are a must.
- Good communication: we value clear and concise communication.
- Problem solving: ability to resolve issues with creativity, initiative and good judgement.
- Time management: working efficiently makes employees and customers happy!
- Detail-oriented: a trained eye will notice every detail, nothing gets past you.
- Customer-focused: our customers are our priority at all times!

Candidates with the following experience are encouraged to apply: waiter, hotel housekeeping, caretaker, hospitality, carpet cleaners, home health aide, general laborer.

We will contact you by email, text or phone immediately once you have applied!

As a housekeeper, you will be traveling to our customer's homes as part of a team to perform cleaning and sanitizing throughout the assigned property. This is a team environment where we work in 2-person crews using our proven Two Maids & A Mop systems, products and equipment.

Job requirements:   
- 18 years old or older.
- Available to work Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
- You have a strong work ethic and enjoy serving people.
- Must have your own vehicle and a valid driver’s license.

Two Maids & A Mop was recently recognized by Inc. Magazine as the nation's fastest growing cleaning company! We provide residential cleaning services that range from routine weekly maintenance to deep cleanings of a home from top to bottom. We recognize and reward top performers through our one of a kind Pay for Performance Plan, and we are passionate about our partnership with “Cleaning For A Reason” where we provide free cleanings to individuals undergoing cancer treatment. Our growth and success allow us to provide opportunities to individuals who want to be a part of something bigger and find satisfaction in a career as a Professional House Cleaner!

For more information, please refer to our website:
https://twomaidsandamop.com/

- 18 years old or older.
- Available to work Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
- You have a strong work ethic and enjoy serving people.

- 18 years old or older.
- Available to work Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
- You have a strong work ethic and enjoy serving people.

- 18 years old or older.
- Available to work Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
- You have a strong work ethic and enjoy serving people.

- 18 years old or older.
- Available to work Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
- You have a strong work ethic and enjoy serving people.

- 18 years old or older.
- Available to work Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
- You have a strong work ethic and enjoy serving people.

Look no further – a housekeeper career with Two Maids & A Mop is the job for you! Our company provides a culture where it's possible to have fun, work hard, and feel appreciated.

We offer our housekeepers a competitive compensation package that includes mileage reimbursement, paid training and all of your supplies and equipment. We believe that hard work and top performance deserve recognition.

Employee benefits:
- Competitive compensation and mileage reimbursement.
- No nights. No weekends. No holidays!
- Family-oriented work environment.
- Advancement opportunities.
- Paid training.
- Uniform and equipment provided.

Key qualifications:
- Energetic: our days are fast-paced and dynamic, there is very little downtime.
- Dependable: this is a full-time position and consistent attendance is very important.
- Trustworthy: honesty and integrity are a must.
- Good communication: we value clear and concise communication.
- Problem solving: ability to resolve issues with creativity, initiative and good judgement.
- Time management: working efficiently makes employees and customers happy!
- Detail-oriented: a trained eye will notice every detail, nothing gets past you.
- Customer-focused: our customers are our priority at all times!

Candidates with the following experience are encouraged to apply: waiter, hotel housekeeping, caretaker, hospitality, carpet cleaners, home health aide, general laborer.

We will contact you by email, text or phone immediately once you have applied!

As a housekeeper, you will be traveling to our customer's homes as part of a team to perform cleaning and sanitizing throughout the assigned property. This is a team environment where we work in 2-person crews using our proven Two Maids & A Mop systems, products and equipment.

Job requirements:   
- 18 years old or older.
- Available to work Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
- You have a strong work ethic and enjoy serving people.
- Must have your own vehicle and a valid driver’s license.

Two Maids & A Mop was recently recognized by Inc. Magazine as the nation's fastest growing cleaning company! We provide residential cleaning services that range from routine weekly maintenance to deep cleanings of a home from top to bottom. We recognize and reward top performers through our one of a kind Pay for Performance Plan, and we are passionate about our partnership with “Cleaning For A Reason” where we provide free cleanings to individuals undergoing cancer treatment. Our growth and success allow us to provide opportunities to individuals who want to be a part of something bigger and find satisfaction in a career as a Professional House Cleaner!

For more information, please refer to our website:
https://twomaidsandamop.com/

See job description in English and Spanish below:

Ama de llaves, limpieza
¡Contratación inmediata!

¿Eres una persona con gran energía que disfruta dar un servicio excelente? Si es así, considera unirte a nuestro equipo de Two Maids & A Mop! Somos una empresa de limpieza única que reconoce el esfuerzo de trabajo.

Ofrecemos un paquete de compensación competitivo que incluye reembolso de millas, entrenamiento pagado y todos los materiales de limpieza y equipos.

Beneficios:
- Compensación competitive y reembolso de millas.
- ¡No noches. No fines de semana. No feriados!
- Ofrecemos un ambiente de trabajo orientado a la familia.
- Oportunidades de crecimiento profesional.
- Entrenamiento pagado.
- Se provee uniforme y equipo.

Características principales del candidato ideal:
- Energético: ¡nuestros días son agiles y dinámicos, nadie se aburre!
- Consistente: buscamos gente responsable que busca trabajar consistemente de lunes a viernes.
- Confiable: honestidad e integridad son características críticas.
- Buena comunicación: valoramos comunicación clara y concisa.
- Solucionador de problemas: capacidad para resolver problemas con creatividad, iniciativa y buen juicio.
- Buen manejo de tiempo: ¡el trabajo eficiente resulta en empleados y clientes contentos!
- Orientación al detalle: tener un buen ojo para los detalles, nada se te pasa.
- Orientación al cliente: nuestros clientes son nuestra prioridad todo el tiempo.
 
Alentamos a postular a los candidatos con la siguiente experiencia: personal de restaurante, trabajador de limpieza de hotel, limpiadores de alfombras, asistente de salud en el hogar, cuidador, trabajador en general.

¡Nos comunicaremos con usted por correo electrónico, texto o teléfono inmediatamente una vez que haya solicitado!

Ofrecemos un paquete de compensación competitivo que incluye reembolso de millas, entrenamiento pagado y todos los materiales de limpieza y equipos.

Requisitos:
- Debe tener 18 años de edad o más.
- Disponible de lunes a viernes, 8am a 4pm.
- Debe tener buena ética de trabajo y disfrutar dar buen servicio a clientes.
- Debe tener su propio vehículo y licencia de conducir válida.

Puedes encontrar mas información de la empresa en la siguiente pagina web:
https://twomaidsandamop.com/

Company Overview
You've Got Maids is one of the largest home cleaning franchises in the USA, and we plan to be #1 in this community! We are growing and have more hours than cleaners!  We are inspired to provide top-quality professional home cleaning services to communities across America.
Job Summary
This is a long term, consistent, full time, year-round, day job with a premier house cleaning service. We clean homes Monday through Friday, starting  between 7:30 AM - 8 AM.  Be a part of a team as you will meet up with your co-workers every morning, put company supplies in a company car to clean a few houses then return to the office when you're complete.  
Responsibilities 
  • Clean our client’s homes the YGM Way!
  • Courteous professionalism with clients and staff
  • Dependability, reliability, and punctuality
Qualifications
  • Detail-oriented with pride in your work
  • Balance quality with speed of cleaning
  • Clean record? (No DUIs and no theft, etc)
  • Basic English
  • Positive attitude
  • Physical job... active all day with light lifting (most less than 10lbs)
Benefits/Perks
  • No nights, weekends, or holidays
  • Paid training
  • Paid weekly
  • Paid is hourly: Our full-time cleaners make several $hundreds per week
  • Tips & bonuses
  • Weekend hours may be available if desired
  • Paid holidays and paid vacation
 Starting Salary $400 - $500/week PLUS Tips and Bonuses

Notice
YGM Franchise LLC is the franchisor of the You’ve Got Maids® franchise system. Each You’ve Got Maids® franchised location is independently-owned and operated by an independent franchisee performing services. As a service to its independent franchisees, YGM Franchise  LLC lists employment opportunities available throughout the franchised network so those employment opportunities may be conveniently found by interested parties at one central location for brand management purposes only. YGM Franchise LLC is NOT the employer seeking help. The only employer is the independent franchisee who has listed its available positions on this website.

I acknowledge that each independent You’ve Got Maids® franchisee hires and determines the terms and conditions of employment for its own employees. Any employment benefits, compensation and employment practices vary by location. Neither YGM Franchise LLC (“Franchisor”) nor its affiliates have the power to: (1) hire, fire or modify the employment condition of franchisee’s employees; (2) supervise and control franchisee’s employee work schedule or conditions of employment; (3) determine the rate and method of payment; or (4) accept, review or maintain franchisee employment records. YGM Franchise LLC is NOT the employer and/or joint employer for: (i) any of the job opportunities listed on this website; (ii) any of the independent franchisees; and, (iii) any of the employees of the independent franchisees.

Maid Right is a professional residential cleaning company with locations across the US and Canada. Maid Right of Spring, TX is passionate about making life better for families in The Woodlands and Spring area by providing them the joy of living in a clean home. We love what we do and treat our team members as family. We're looking for awesome people to service our clients by cleaning their homes and making their lives better.
 
 What We Are Looking For?
 
  • Love to Clean - We are a believer that “The only way to do great work is to love what you do”. To be successful, it is important you love the reasons why we do what we do: To make life better by letting families experience the joy of entering a clean home. 
  • A Go-Getter - You are resourceful and give 100% all the time.
  • Eye for Detail - You notice little things that others miss! You know that it is the tiny details that make our families happy.   
  • A Good Listener -  You know how to listen to others. You do not get offended by constructive criticism.
  • A Good Communicator - You can easily relate with others and bring a positive attitude.
  • Reliable - Dependable and trustworthy.
What We Offer:
  • Immediate hire
  • Comprehensive Paid Training
  • Weekly Compensation  
  • No working Nights
  • Flexible schedule!
  • Advancement Opportunities
  • We provide all the cleaning supplies!
  • Independent work environment!
  • Laid back, welcoming, and positive work environment
Requirements:
  • Authorized to work in the United States
  • Willing to drive around the territory
  • Pass a comprehensive background check
  •  2+ years of cleaning experience
  • Reliable transportation
  • Smart phone
Supplemental Pay Types:
  • Bonus pay
  • Tips

***Welcome to your new job*** We are looking for a cleaner that wants to make great wages, have a great schedule, and grow with us. 

As an Hourly Cleaner, you will clean residential and light commercial properties. Most all work is done Monday through Friday 8-5pm. No evening hours, unless requested. You will work on a team of two. 

No experience required. We will train you on our Maid Right cleaning system that is effective and easy to learn! 
  • Good pay, with the ability to earn bonus and tips. 
  • Advancement opportunities 
  • Small Company with great backing that will work with your needs.
  • Working in great communities, working with the communities, and improving Lifes daily.

As a House Cleaner, you will clean residential and light commercial properties. Most all work is done Monday through Friday 8-5pm. No evening hours, unless requested. You will work on a team of two cleaners.  
No experience required. We will train you on our Maid Right cleaning system that is effective and easy to learn! 
  • Good pay and consistent pay with the ability to earn bonus and tips. 
  • Advancement opportunities 
  • Great company culture where everyone is treated with respect 
  • No experience necessary, but experience could result in more pay
  • Looking to grow with new associates that want to work with a better work life balance than retail, sales, or restaurants
  • Customer facing experience is a plus.

This is what you have been looking for!! As Cleaner with Maid Right of North Indianapolis you will clean residential and light commercial properties. We will ensure great pay, great hours, great locations, and supply all materials needed!  Also, all work is done Monday through Friday 8-6pm! No evening hours, unless requested. You work on a team of two cleaners. 

Don't miss this fantastic opportunity to make a better wage, have a stable schedule, and work for a small company that has your interest in mind as well as your family.  Join us today!!

No experience required. We will train you on our Maid Right cleaning system that is effective and easy to learn! 
  • Good pay, with the ability to earn bonus and tips. 
  • Advancement opportunities 
  • Great company culture where everyone is treated with respect

jobs_name: Housekeeping / House Attendant / Maid Job / Residential Cleaner
jobs_description:
Maid Right is hiring professional cleaners to join our rapidly growing team! Full-time / Part-Time - House cleaning position available immediately!

We are looking for a full-time housekeeping/house attendant/maid with luxury hotel and high-end home experience. The candidate reports to the high-profile key individual’s personal assistant.

Ensure that key individual’s home and guest accommodations and all areas front and back of house are always maintained in a spotless condition. Ensure that the standards are met throughout the home.  We're looking for great people who are ambitious, have a good attitude, and are totally trustworthy! Become a Maid Right Cleaner today and we will pay you to learn all the tricks to a rewarding career!

Maid Right pride ourselves on rewarding our team members' hard work and are committed to providing unlimited career advancement opportunities. Join our team today!

Here are a few reasons you'll love working with us:

  • Weekly Bonuses
  • No Nights
  • No Weekends
  • Quarterly Company Events 
  • Tips
  • Weekly Paychecks (with direct deposit available)
  • Monthly Recognition
You must have:

· A positive attitude
 · Possess a passion for excellence, flawless service and the highest level of integrity and work ethic
 · Luxury Hotel training and experience in hotels is a HUGE PLUS!
 · A meticulous attention to detail and superb organizational skills
 · Sharp and driven with unshakeable work ethic.
 · Exceptional ability to proactively anticipate needs
 · Self-motivated and has a can-do attitude
 · Ability to multitask, prioritize and maintain grace in a fast-paced environment
 · Shows enthusiasm and passion in everything they do

As a Housekeeping Maid, you will clean residential and light commercial properties. Most all work is done Monday through Friday 8-5pm. No evening hours, unless requested. You will work on a team of two cleaners.  
No experience required. We will train you on our Maid Right cleaning system that is effective and easy to learn! 
  • Good pay, with the ability to earn bonus and tips. 
  • Advancement opportunities 
  • Great company culture where everyone is treated with respect 
The job starts as a part-time job and becomes full time after 6 weeks.

As a Housekeeping Maid, you will clean residential and light commercial properties. Most work is done Monday through Friday 8-5pm. No evening hours, unless requested. You will work on a team of two cleaners.  
No experience required. We will train you on our Maid Right cleaning system that is effective and easy to learn! 
  • Good pay, with the ability to earn bonus and tips. 
  • Advancement opportunities 
  • Great company culture where everyone is treated with respect

En este puesto se requiere limpiar casas y ocasionalmente propiedades comerciales. La mayoría de los trabajos van de lunes a viernes 8-5pm. Trabajos fuera de esos horarios serán de manera excepcional. Cada equipo de limpieza está conformado por dos personas.
No se requiere experiencia. Nosotros nos encargamos de capacitar al personal para que conozcan los procedimientos de limpieza de Maid Right, los cuales son efectivos y sencillos de aprender. 

  • Buena paga con posibilidad de ganar bonos y propinas.
  • Oportunidad de crecimiento.
  • Excelente cultura organizacional donde todos son tratados con respeto.
  • Contratación inmediata.

Se requiere contar con permiso de trabajo en Estados Unidos.

Maid Right Cleaning Services: 
As a Housekeeping Maid, you will clean residential and light commercial properties. Most all work is done Monday through Friday 8am-5pm. Maid Right exists to inspire people to find, embrace, and unleash the power of extraordinary within a culture where everyone is treated with dignity and respect. 
  • Weekly Paycheck (Direct Deposit) 
  • Tips and Bonuses based on performance
  • No Evenings (Unless Requested) / Some Weekends
  • Paid Time Off for Birthdays
  • Quarterly Company Events
  • Monthly Recognition
Details about the job:
We're looking for great people who are ambitious with a good attitude, and are totally trustworthy! Become a Maid Right Cleaner today and we will pay you to learn all the tricks to a rewarding career!
  • Mon-Fri 8am-5pm 
  • Service Area: Bell County
  • This is a physical job (remember we 'glisten' here) and not a boring stand behind a register or desk job (*yawn)
Must Have:
We only work with team players. Must have a good attitudes, can communicate well. Please no negative attitudes or complainers.
  • Be 18 and over with a valid TX driver's license
  • Must have a car with current insurance
  • Speak & read English
  • Smartphone & bank account
HUGE Plus:
Being bi-lingual in speaking Spanish and English is a HUGE plus!

Welcome for Two Maids and a Mop Gilbert

We service the East Valley cities of Gilbert, Chandler, Queen Creek, Mesa, and Apache Junction. Two Maids Gilbert is a Franchise of 100 plus locations that are Nationwide (Individually Owned).  We strive together, as a team of 45 plus employees, to be the most reputable House Cleaning company in the Valley.
We offer a competitive compensation package that includes all of your supplies and equipment, as well as regular bonuses, awards, and incentives. We believe that hard work and top performance deserve recognition. 

 
What you need to know:
  • Two Maids and a Mop of Gilbert is the fastest growing company of 2021. We are the best location four years running.
  • We have received Most Talked about Office for 2021, Best of Gilbert for 2022.
  • Pink Blazer of 2021, BHAG of 2021 and second year running for 2022.

  Requirements: 
  • Must be 18 years old or older! 
  • Must be able to work Monday - Friday 7:15am - 5:00 pm or until finished 
  • Must have your own vehicle and a valid driver’s license
  •  Employer-sponsored benefits-health, dental, vision and 401k. 
  • Mileage reimbursement & weekly bonus opportunity
  • Earn with our Pay for Performance plus Tips



Apply today to schedule an interview! Just click the link below, 
schedule your interview and return here and finish your application.

  • Compensation: $120-$175 day
We offer a competitive compensation package that includes all of your supplies and equipment, as well as regular bonuses, awards, and incentives.  We believe that hard work and top performance deserve recognition.
 
 
We are looking for people who have:  
  • A meticulous eye for detail, nothing gets past you! 
  • A person who has dreams to do more than clean homes! 
  • We need future leaders! We are growing and need people who are future focused!
  • A desire for flexible hours Mon-Fri 7:30am to 5:00pm! 
  • A valid driver’s license and vehicle to go from job to job throughout the day! 
  • A strong work ethic and enjoys serving others!
  • A desire to make more money than whatever the “hourly rate” is! We pay for performance! When our customers are happy you earn more!
We give back to our community by servicing cancer patients in partnership with "Cleaning for A Reason"

 Two Maids & A Mop was recently recognized by Inc. Magazine as the nation's fastest growing cleaning company! We provide residential cleaning services that range from routine weekly maintenance to deep cleanings of a home from top to bottom. We recognize and reward top performers through our one of a kind Pay for Performance Plan, and we are passionate about our partnership with “Cleaning For A Reason” where we provide free cleanings to individuals undergoing cancer treatment. Our growth and success allow us to provide opportunities to individuals who want to be a part of something bigger and find satisfaction in a career as a Professional House Cleaner!

Check us out on Facebook! Two Maids & A Mop of Shoreview

Company Overview
You've Got Maids is one of the largest home cleaning franchises in the USA, and we plan to be #1 in this community! We are growing and have more hours than cleaners!  We are inspired to provide top-quality professional home cleaning services to communities across America.
Job Summary
This is a long term, consistent, full time, year-round, day job with <your town>'s premier house cleaning service. We clean homes Monday through Friday, starting at 8 AM.  Be a part of a team as you will meet up with your co-workers every morning, put company supplies in a company car to clean a few houses then return to the office when you're complete.  
Responsibilities 
  • Clean our client’s homes the YGM Way!
  • Courteous professionalism with clients and staff
  • Dependability, reliability, and punctuality
Qualifications
  • Detail-oriented with pride in your work
  • Balance quality with speed of cleaning
  • Clean record? (No DUIs and no theft, etc)
  • Basic English
  • Positive attitude
  • Physical job... active all day with light lifting (most less than 10lbs)
Benefits/Perks
  • No nights, weekends, or holidays
  • Paid training
  • Paid weekly
  • Paid is hourly: Our full-time cleaners make several $hundreds per week
  • Tips & bonuses
  • Weekend hours may be available if desired
  • Paid holidays and paid vacation
 
Notice
YGM Franchise LLC is the franchisor of the You’ve Got Maids® franchise system. Each You’ve Got Maids® franchised location is independently-owned and operated by an independent franchisee performing services. YGM Franchise LLC is NOT the employer seeking help. The only employer is the independent franchisee who has listed its available positions on this website.

  •  Sign on bonus- paid out of 3 months
  • Competitive compensation & Tips
  • Paid training from day one
  • Great opportunity for advancement
  • Great office support
  • Paid weekly- direct deposit available
  • All cleaning supplies and equipment provided

  • Flexible schedule
  • Bonus for every great review given!
  • Mileage Reimbursement between jobs
  • Good Attendance Bonus
  • Portable Voluntary Benefits program after 6 months
  • Paid Accident insurance after 6 months 
 
ABOUT eMaids
eMaids is a national cleaning service provider that is passionately concerned with giving our residential and commercial clients a sparkling transformation that surpasses expectations.
Here at eMaids, we pride ourselves on delivering top-notch services that guarantee our customer satisfaction and we are currently seeking employees in the area that will help add value to our organization. As an employee at eMaids, you become part of our family! We care about our employees and ensure that you get adequate office support, paid training on the job while you enjoy a phenomenal working environment.
 
 JOB SUMMARY
 eMaids of East Queens & West Nassau is growing fast and we are looking for part-time qualified Housekeepers to join our team in the area. eMaids is an amazing organization and will be glad to have you as our next team member!  Do you have an eye for detail?  Do you get satisfaction from leaving a home neat and sparkling? Then we want you to join our team!
 
RESPONSIBILITIES
On the job, you will be required to deliver quality cleaning services to our client’s residential or commercial properties: 
  • Home and apartment cleaning
  • Office cleaning
  • Airbnb
  • This will require that you use our non-allergic products in cleaning and to follow our checklist to ensure complete client satisfaction.
  • Communicate with customers in a professional and courteous manner
  • Deliver great customer service
  • Some days you work Solo, some days as a team! 
 
REQUIREMENTS
eMaids is looking for true professionals who are serious about their work, love to clean and are extremely customer service oriented.  
Candidate must:
  • Speak and write English (Though fluency is not required)
  • Have at least 1-year cleaning experience
  • Must have a reliable vehicle and valid driver’s license 
  • Legal to Work in the U. S.
  • Must be open to having a background check
  • Must have a working understanding of technology, (smartphone, GPS & email)
  • Must have the ability to commute and be comfortable working in multiple locations, this is not one location.
Does this sound like something you can do?? Apply online and we will get back to you ASAP to schedule the interview.

ABOUT eMaids

eMaids is a National cleaning service provider that is passionately concerned with giving our residential and commercial clients a sparkling transformation that surpasses expectations.

 
Apply online and we will get back to you ASAP to schedule the interview !

Company and Culture
Merry Maids is a professional housecleaning company that offers the best cleaning solutions and customer service to our clients.  As trusted in-home professionals, we form strong relationships with our clients and are often considered part of their extended families.
  • Paid Training
  • Competitive Pay
  • Flexible Schedules
  • Career Path Opportunities
  • Positive team atmosphere
Job Position Description:
Professionally clean customer homes using Merry Maids’ unique cleaning procedures and products.  As a team member, you will be responsible to provide exceptional customer service by consistently cleaning homes.
Responsibilities:
  • Use Merry Maids cleaning products and procedures to clean in customer homes
  • Use provided equipment including vacuums and microfiber cleaning cloths
  • Clean all surfaces in home, including fans, blinds, light fixtures, baseboards, fixtures, counters, showers, toilets, cabinets, and floors
  • Ability to clean floors on hands and knees in kitchens and bathrooms
  • Vacuum all stairs, carpet, hard surface floors and furniture
  • Move all reasonably moveable furniture to clean under and behind
  • Carry all cleaning products and equipment to and from office, vehicle, and customers’ homes
  • Assist in keeping supplies stocked and maintain equipment
  • Contribute to a positive work climate with a pleasant attitude.
Qualifications:
  • Ability to differentiate between cleaning products and uses
  • Ability to read cleaning instructions
  • Strong communication and customer service skills
  • Ability lift and carry 8lbs. of equipment
  • Ability to withstand regular physical contact with dog and cat hair, mold, dust, mildew and cleaning solutions
  • Ability to drive to and from various job sites

Apply today!

JOB SUMMARY

eMaids of Los Angeles is a top-rated residential and commercial cleaning company serving a large network of clients. If you are an experienced home or office cleaner OR new to the business… we are looking to hire immediately. Se habla español. 


Before we talk about the job, let us talk about the money! 

  • We will give you paid training with a competitive pay rate
  •  Pay raise opportunities within your first year with eMaids
  •  We pay weekly
  •  We give you the opportunity to earn more every month with commissions
  •  Oh yes, and who can forget the tips! You will earn tips and you keep them all!

 eMaids will also save you hard cash:

We supply the supplies and tools, oh did we mention amazing tools!

  •  Cordless Vacuum
  •  Electrostatic disinfecting machine
  •  Microfiber clamping mop
  •  Knee pads
  •  Pre-treated cleaning cloths
  •  Easy phone app, and system in place to make your life easier!

 Now, let us go over what we are looking for in you:
 
Bring value, this means showing up on time and reliably, actively being a team player, approaching
challenging jobs with grit, seeking out ways to grow your skills, and being an amazing ambassador for eMaids on every job you’re assigned to.
 
Here are a few things that are not required, but it would be beneficial:  

  •  Having experience in hotel industry room cleaning
  •  Have knowledge of cleaning supplies and how to use them. 
  • Professional drive- every Residential Cleaner is on track to becoming a Training Manager within 6 - months. It all comes down to you working hard and wanting to get promoted!

Areas we service: The Santa Clarita Valley


Finally, things we just cannot budge on:

  •  MUST be able to speak some English and legally authorized to work in the United States.
  •  MUST be open having a background check done on you.
  •  MUST clean according to our training standards and easy to learn techniques.
  •  MUST have a flexible schedule with at least 20 hours a week for eMaids.
  •  MUST have reliable vehicle with no foreseeable disruptions. 
  •  MUST have a valid driver’s license. If you want to join a great company and think you have what it takes, we want you to apply and join our team!

Before we talk about the job, let us talk about the money! 

  • We will give you paid training with a competitive pay rate
  •  Pay raise opportunities within your first year with eMaids
  •  We pay weekly
  •  We give you the opportunity to earn more every month with commissions
  •  Oh yes, and who can forget the tips! You will earn tips and you keep them all!

 eMaids will also save you hard cash:

We supply the supplies and tools, oh did we mention amazing tools!

  •  Cordless Vacuum
  •  Electrostatic disinfecting machine
  •  Microfiber clamping mop
  •  Knee pads
  •  Pre-treated cleaning cloths
  •  Easy phone app, and system in place to make your life easier!

 Now, let us go over what we are looking for in you:
 
Bring value, this means showing up on time and reliably, actively being a team player, approaching
challenging jobs with grit, seeking out ways to grow your skills, and being an amazing ambassador for eMaids on every job you’re assigned to.
 
Here are a few things that are not required, but it would be beneficial:  

  •  Having experience in hotel industry room cleaning
  •  Have knowledge of cleaning supplies and how to use them. 
  • Professional drive- every Residential Cleaner is on track to becoming a Training Manager within 6 - months. It all comes down to you working hard and wanting to get promoted!

Areas we service: The Santa Clarita Valley


Finally, things we just cannot budge on:

  •  MUST be able to speak some English and legally authorized to work in the United States.
  •  MUST be open having a background check done on you.
  •  MUST clean according to our training standards and easy to learn techniques.
  •  MUST have a flexible schedule with at least 20 hours a week for eMaids.
  •  MUST have reliable vehicle with no foreseeable disruptions. 
  •  MUST have a valid driver’s license. If you want to join a great company and think you have what it takes, we want you to apply and join our team!

Looking for an opportunity to grow, come and join us at eMaids of Montgomery County !!!!



WHY WORK FOR eMaids?

  • Great office support
  • Competitive compensation
  • Paid training from day one 
  • Great opportunity for advancement
  • Paid weekly- direct deposit available
  • All cleaning supplies and equipment provided
  • 5-Star Service Review Bonuses
  • Client Retention Bonuses
  • New Client Referral Bonus

JOB SUMMARY

eMaids is  excited to be recruiting for professional PART-TIME Professional Maid to join our team in the area. DAY SHIFT- NO EVENING AVAILABILITY.


RESPONSIBILITIES
You will be required to deliver quality cleaning services to our client’s residential or commercial properties:

Cleaning of various properties like (Offices, Apartments, Houses, Commercial Properties, etc.)


REQUIREMENTS

**Applicants must be able to travel to different locations.

**Must live within Montgomery County (Rockville, Gaithersburg, Chevy Chase, Germantown, Takoma Park, Silver Spring, Olney , Kensington, Clarksburg, or closer to these areas) .


Apply online and  we will get back to you ASAP to schedule the interview!

  •  Pay raise opportunities within your first year with eMaids
  •  We pay weekly
  •  We give you the opportunity to earn more every month with commissions
  •  Oh yes, and who can forget the tips! You will earn tips and you keep them all!

 eMaids will also save you hard cash:

We supply the supplies and tools, oh did we mention amazing tools!

  •  Cordless Vacuum
  •  Electrostatic disinfecting machine
  •  Microfiber clamping mop
  •  Knee pads
  •  Pre-treated cleaning cloths
  •  Easy phone app, and system in place to make your life easier!

 Now, let us go over what we are looking for in you:
 
Bring value, this means showing up on time and reliably, actively being a team player, approaching
challenging jobs with grit, seeking out ways to grow your skills, and being an amazing ambassador for eMaids on every job you’re assigned to.
 
Here are a few things that are not required, but it would be beneficial:  

  •  Having experience in hotel industry room cleaning
  •  Have knowledge of cleaning supplies and how to use them. 
  • Professional drive- every Residential Cleaner is on track to becoming a Training Manager within 6 - months. It all comes down to you working hard and wanting to get promoted!

Areas we service: The Santa Clarita Valley


Finally, things we just cannot budge on:

  •  MUST be able to speak some English and legally authorized to work in the United States.
  •  MUST be open having a background check done on you.
  •  MUST clean according to our training standards and easy to learn techniques.
  •  MUST have a flexible schedule with at least 20 hours a week for eMaids.
  •  MUST have reliable vehicle with no foreseeable disruptions. 
  •  MUST have a valid driver’s license. If you want to join a great company and think you have what it takes, we want you to apply and join our team!

Job Description 
Are you family oriented? Is company culture important to you? Are you looking for growth opportunities? Do you enjoy making customers and your teammates smile? Do you prefer to have weekends off with flexible schedules? If so, come work for a company who cares at the ecomaids of Sarasota & Bradenton. Join the team where continuing to have a positive work environment is our #1 goal. 
 
Benefits
  • Evening and weekends not required (available for overtime opportunities)
  • Performance bonuses and growth opportunity
  • Supplied products, equipment and laundry services
  • Full service office support
  • Get paid for all hours PLUS earn more based on your performance
  • Top Rated Company
  • 8-5 pm Monday-Friday Schedules
  • All-natural cleaning products that are healthy for you to use on a daily basis
  • Company supplied High-quality cleaning equipment and supplies including laundry service
  • Paid for all hours worked, including driving
  • Paid on-the-job training
  • Reliable company vehicles
  • Opportunities for future advancement as, trainers, managers

You May Be A Great Fit If
  • You have a customer service background such as CNA & Senior Caregiver, or are service-minded
  • You enjoy working in the service industry whether that's restaurants or entertainment (i.e. bartender, server, barista, retail cashier, etc.)
  • You have experience as a custodian, janitor, housekeeping,  warehouse, or in assembly and enjoy a dynamic, team environment
 
We are looking for team members that thrive on customer happiness, display good teamwork and take pride and satisfaction in a job well done. This is a great potential fit for those with service backgrounds looking for entry level opportunities with little to no experience needed. If this is you, come join our team!

We provide: 
  • Competitive Wages
  • Opportunity for advancement
  • Flexible scheduling - Pick your own hours
  • No weekends
  • Company Logo wear
 
MUST HAVE RESIDENTIAL MAID EXPERIENCE and live within 15 miles of our service area.  We are seeking a professional House Cleaner to join our team! As a House Cleaner, you will perform a variety of light cleaning and organizing duties, with an emphasis on exceptional customer experience and repeat business. The perfect candidate will be friendly, punctual, eager to learn and provide thorough cleanings while maintaining speed. If this sounds like you, we invite you to apply!
 
Responsibilities:
  • Clean residential homes/military base houses
  • Ensure a clean and orderly environment
  • Maintain a pleasant and friendly attitude
  • Assist with training new employees when required
  • Move reasonably small furniture as necessary
  • Maintain working condition of cleaning equipment
 
​Qualifications:
  • MUST HAVE:  Residential MAID experience or military base housing experience
  • Familiarity with cleaning materials and equipment
  • Strong attention to detail
  • Ability to work on a team
  • Strong work ethic
  • Ability to lift 25lbs and to maneuver stairs without difficulty
 
My husband Tim and I opened our TruBlue Total House Care to take care of our community.  We wanted to provide quality service to the senior population and military families on the Peninsula.  Being part of a national and very quickly growing franchise is exciting, and so are the services we provide as a veteran/family-owned small business.  All employees are bonded and insured and take pride in being a part of TruBlue of Yorktown.  We hope you will see the value in being a part of our team.

Position Summary 
Crew members are responsible for following cleaning plans, workflows, and crew leader’s directives to properly clean client’s homes in a timely manner. Crew members should be physically fit and able to work with minimal supervision. They can multitask as well as demonstrate exceptional cleaning, communication, and time-management skills.
 
Essential Duties and Responsibilities
The essential functions include, but are not limited to the following:
  • Review the cleaning plan prior to each clean to determine which cleaners are allowed to be used in the home, learn the location of trash cans and trash bags, and note any excluded areas or do not touch items. 
  • Follow the workflow given by the Crew Leader.
  • Dusting to remove dirt and debris from décor and furniture.
  • Vacuuming and mopping floors. 
  • Washing windows that can be accessed easily with a 3-step ladder.
  • Scrubbing toilets, showers, bathtubs, and bathroom sinks.
  • Wiping down kitchen appliances, equipment, and counters.
  • Emptying and taking out trash.
  • Washing, drying, and replacing bed linens.
Minimum Qualifications (Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities)
·      High school diploma or GED preferred
·      One or more years professional housekeeping experience or related experience required
·      One or more years general customer service experience required
·      Sound knowledge of different cleaning methods
·      Ability to work with minimal supervision
·      Ability to multitask
·      Excellent organizational, time-management, and problem-solving skills
·      Effective communication skills
·      Physically fit
·      Detail-oriented
 
JOB REQUIREMENTS
·      Driver’s License
·      Authorized to Work in the US
·      Criminal Background Check
 
Physical Demands and Work Environment 

The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this position. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the functions. While performing the duties of this position, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear. The employee frequently is required to use hands or fingers, handle, or feel objects, tools, or controls. The employee is regularly required to stand; walk; sit; reach with hands and arms; climb or balance; and stoop, kneel, crouch, or crawl. The employee must regularly lift and/or move up to 25 pounds. Specific vision abilities required by this position include those required for reading, writing, and typing. The noise level in the work environment is usually moderate.
 
Schedule

Workdays are Monday through Thursday. Arrival time is between 4:30 and 5:30 am. Departure time is between 4:30 and 6:00 pm. We are closed Friday, Saturday, and Sunday giving you time for personal appointments and weekends with your family.  We are closed the following Holidays: New Year's Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, Black Friday, Christmas Eve, & Christmas Day. Eligible for paid holidays upon completion of your 6-month review. Note: when a holiday falls on Monday-Thursday, the schedule will adjust to work on Friday and some Saturdays to accommodate the holiday.

  •  Sign on bonus- paid out of 3 months

  • Flexible schedule

ABOUT eMaids
eMaids is a national cleaning service provider that is passionately concerned with giving our residential and commercial clients a sparkling transformation that surpasses expectations.
Here at eMaids, we pride ourselves on delivering top-notch services that guarantee our customer satisfaction and we are currently seeking employees in the area that will help add value to our organization. As an employee at eMaids, you become part of our family! We care about our employees and ensure that you get adequate office support, paid training on the job while you enjoy a phenomenal working environment.
 
 JOB SUMMARY
 eMaids of East Queens & West Nassau is growing fast and we are looking for part-time qualified Housekeepers to join our team in the area. eMaids is an amazing organization and will be glad to have you as our next team member!  Do you have an eye for detail?  Do you get satisfaction from leaving a home neat and sparkling? Then we want you to join our team!
 
RESPONSIBILITIES
On the job, you will be required to deliver quality cleaning services to our client’s residential or commercial properties: 
  • Home and apartment cleaning
  • Office cleaning
  • Airbnb
  • This will require that you use our non-allergic products in cleaning and to follow our checklist to ensure complete client satisfaction.
  • Communicate with customers in a professional and courteous manner
  • Deliver great customer service
  • Some days you work Solo, some days as a team! 
 
REQUIREMENTS
eMaids is looking for true professionals who are serious about their work, love to clean and are extremely customer service oriented.  
Candidate must:
  • Speak and write English (Though fluency is not required)
  • Have at least 1-year cleaning experience
  • Must have a reliable vehicle and valid driver’s license 
  • Legal to Work in the U. S.
  • Must be open to having a background check
  • Must have a working understanding of technology, (smartphone, GPS & email)
  • Must have the ability to commute and be comfortable working in multiple locations, this is not one location.
Does this sound like something you can do?? Apply online and we will get back to you ASAP to schedule the interview.

Are you family oriented? Is company culture important to you? Do you prefer to have weekends off with flexible schedules? If so, come work for a company who cares at the ecomaids of Northfield! Join the team were continuing to have a positive work environment is our #1 goal.  

Benefits include, Paid Time Off, Tips & Bonuses, Company Vehicles and Supplies, Opportunity to Advance. Get paid for all hours PLUS earn more based on your performance.

Benefits and Perks

  • Top Rated Company 
  • Health Insurance / Health Care 
  • Hourly pay + Performance Bonus + Tips 
  • 8-5pm Monday-Friday Schedules 
  • All-natural cleaning products that are healthy for you to use on a daily basis
  • Company supplied High-quality cleaning equipment and supplies including laundry service
  • Paid on-the-job training
  • Reliable company vehicles
  • Paid time off
  • Profit Sharing plan  
  • Opportunities for future advancement as, trainers, managers

Job Requirements: 

  • Self-motivated and ability to work both in a team and independently 
  • Flexible interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively throughout all levels of the organization 
  • Transportation to the office 
  • Ability to drive revenue through customer service and team building 
  • Strong leadership aptitude 

You May Be A Great Fit If

  • You have a customer service background such as CNA & Senior Caregiver, or are service-minded
  • You enjoy working in the service industry whether that's restaurants or entertainment (i.e. bartender, server, barista, retail cashier, etc.)
  • You have experience as a custodian, janitor, housekeeping,  warehouse, or in assembly and enjoy a dynamic, team environment


We are looking for team members that thrive on customer happiness, display good teamwork and take pride and satisfaction in a job well done. This is a great potential fit for those with service backgrounds looking for entry level opportunities with little to no experience needed. If this is you, come join our team!
